body: Thank you for your advice, Chris! The updated diagram is shown below. May I confirm with you that, if indoor temperature is within either one of the two 1degree buffer ranges, the thermal zone will be in a **No-NV (windows closed)** and **No-AC (AC off)** status? (I think I asked you this in another post) Can I also confirm with you that if we want the AC to switch on for non-NV conditions, we need to specify True for the isConditioned_ option on the Mass2Zone component? Otherwise, the for the hours with non-NV conditions, the windows will be closed and AC will be off?
